import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { userAuthorPromise } from '../redux/slices/userauthorslice' function Signin() { let {register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}}=useForm() let navigate=useNavigate() async function submit(obj){ let actionObj= userAuthorPromise(obj) dispatch(actionObj) } return (

}
{errors.username?.type==='required' &&

}

}

) } export default Signin
